anya-e1102n5:1_0: Idāni sappurisāti dullabhāti imassa saṁvaṇṇanākkamo sampatto tathā hi loke sappurisāpi atidullabhāyeva.
anya-e1102n5:1_3: maraṇadhammā sattā maraṇato muccanti vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā “mamañhi ānanda kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma jātiyā parimuccanti,
anya-e1102n5:1_4: jarādhammā sattā jarāya muccantī”ti ādi vacanato pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto nāma.
anya-e1102n5:1_6: Tepi alabhantena ekantajahitaṁ sivaṭṭhikaṁ kalyāṇamittaṁ labhitabbaṁ,
anya-e1102n5:4_1: Katamo paṇḍitapuggalo buddhapaccekabuddhā asīti ca mahāsāvakā aññe ca tathāgatassa sāvakā sunettamahāgovindavidhurasarabhaṅgamahosadhasutasomanimirājaayogharakumāraka
anya-e1102n5:4_6: attano vacanakarānaṁ sabbabhayaupaddavūpasaggaviddhaṁsanasamatthā honti tathā hi tathāgataṁ āgamma asaṅkhyeyyā
anya-e1102n5:4_7: aparimāṇā devamanussā āsavakkhayaṁ pattā brahmaloke patiṭṭhitā,
anya-e1102n5:4_9: Sāriputtatthere cittaṁ pasādetvā catūhi ca paccayehi theraṁ upaṭṭhahitvā asīti kusalahassāni sagge nibbattāni,
anya-e1102n5:4_10: tathā mahāmoggalānamahākassapapabhuti sunettassa satthuno sāvakā appekacce brahmaloke upapajjiṁsu,
anya-e1102n5:7_0: Akittipaṇḍito sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n5:8_0: “Dhīraṁ passe suṇe dhīraṁ, dhīrena saha saṁvase;
anya-e1102n5:10_0: Kiṁ nu te akaraṁ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṁ;
anya-e1102n5:12_0: Nayaṁ nayati medhāvī, adurāyaṁ na yuñjati;
anya-e1102n5:13_0: Sanaro seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1102n5:14_0: Vinayaṁ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo”ti.
anya-e1102n5:15_0: Apica tepi sappurise saṅgamma assutapubbampi ubhayalokahitāvahaṁ vācaṁ suyyateva, vuttampi cetaṁ.
anya-e1102n5:16_0: “Subhāsitaṁ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṁ bhaṇe nādhammaṁ taṁ dutiyaṁ;
anya-e1102n5:17_0: Piyaṁ bhaṇe nāppiyaṁ taṁ tatiyaṁ, saccaṁ bhaṇe nālīkaṁ taṁ catuttha”nti ca.
anya-e1102n5:20_2: yato tesampi upakārānussaraṇatā kataññutā sappurisehi pasaṁsanīyādinānappakāravisesādhigamahetūca honti vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā,
anya-e1102n5:20_7: Apica vidhuramahosadhajātakādikālepi idhalokaparalokasampattiatthameva attano vacanakare sammā yojenti.
anya-e1102n5:20_8: Anākulakammantādhiṭṭhānena kālaññutāya patirūpakāritāya analasatāya uṭṭhānavīriyasamatāya abyasaniyatāca
anya-e1102n5:20_10: ete attano vā puttadārassa vā dāsakammakarānaṁ vā byattatāya evaṁ payojitā diṭṭheva dhamme dhanadhaññavitti paṭilābhahetū honti,
anya-e1102n5:21_0: Patirūpakārīri dhuravā, uṭṭhānatā vindate dhananti ca;
anya-e1102n5:26_0: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca; Tiṇāni yo na maññati;
anya-e1102n5:27_0: Sappurisakiccāni, so sukhaṁ na vihāyatī”ti ca.
anya-e1102n5:30_1: Tabbigamena duppurisā bālajanā agavesantopi labbhanteva te bālā attānaṁ sevamāne parajane saṁsāradukkheyeva
anya-e1102n5:30_2: osīdenti bhavato vuṭṭhānaṁ na denti tathā hi pūraṇakassapādayo chasatthārā devadattakokālika-
anya-e1102n5:30_3: modakatissa khaṇḍadeviyāputtasamuddadattaciñcamāṇavikādayo atītakāle ca dīghadukkhassa lābhāti ime aññe
anya-e1102n5:30_4: ca evarūpā sattā bālā aggipadittamiva agāraṁ attanā duggahitena attānañca attano vacanakārake ca vināsenti
anya-e1102n5:30_7: Rājā ajātasattu sāmaññaphalasuttantasavanakāle yadi pitaraṁ aghāteyya,
anya-e1102n5:30_8: sotāpanno bhaveyya pitaraṁ ghātitattā maggaphalampi appatvā lohakumbhiyaṁ saṭṭhivassasahassāni paccitvā muccissati anāgatepi paccekabuddho bhavissati.
anya-e1102n5:30_9: Kokālikopi sāriputtamoggalānatthere anapacāyitvā mahāniraye padumagaṇanāya paccanokāse nirayapadese padumaniraye…pe…
anya-e1102n5:30_10: padumaṁ kho pana aññataro bhikkhu nirayaṁ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggalānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā”ti āha.
anya-e1102n5:30_11: Tattha aññataro bhikkhūti nāmagottena apākaṭaṁ “kiṁ va dīghaṁ nukho bhante padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti
anya-e1102n5:30_12: pañhaṁ pucchitvā nisinnaṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ evamāha “dīghaṁ kho bhikkhu niraye āyuppamāṇaṁ,
anya-e1102n5:30_13: taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti vā ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā
anya-e1102n5:30_14: ettakāni vassasatasahassānī”ti vā sakkā pana bhante upamaṁ kātunti.
anya-e1102n5:30_16: Seyyathāpi bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho hoti,
anya-e1102n5:30_17: tato puriso vassasatassa vassasahassassa accayena ekamekaṁ tilaṁ uddhareyya,
anya-e1102n5:30_18: khippataraṁ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya,
anya-e1102n5:30_22: Vīsatikhāriko ti māgadhikena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti.
anya-e1102n5:30_29: Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma eko paccekanirayo natthi,
anya-e1102n5:30_30: avīcimhi eva pana abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso “abbudo nirayo”ti vutto.
anya-e1102n5:30_32: Tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṁ veditabbā yathāha “sataṁsatasahassāni koṭi hoti evaṁ sataṁsahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma.
anya-e1102n5:30_38: Esa nayo sabbattha ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṁ dukkarā”ti vuttaṁ taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātu’nti keci pana
anya-e1102n5:30_39: tattha paridevanānattenapi kammakaraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānīti vadanti.
anya-e1102n5:30_41: Yathā ca dīghavidassaāghātā ca buddhantaraṁ saṭṭhiyojanamattena attabhāvena uttāno patito mahāniraye paccati yathā ca,
anya-e1102n5:30_42: tassa diṭṭhiabhirucitāni pañca kulasatāni tasseva sahabyataṁ uppannāni mahāniraye paccanti.
anya-e1102n5:30_43: Vuttañcetaṁ bhagavatā “seyyathāpi bhikkhave naḷāgāraṁ vā tiṇāgāraṁ vā aggiphuṭṭho kūṭāgārāni dahati ullittāvalittāni
anya-e1102n5:30_44: nivātāni phusitaggaḷāni pihita vātapānāni evameva kho bhikkhave yānikānici bhayāni uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n5:30_50: Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo appaṭibhayo paṇḍito saupaddavo bālo anupaddavo paṇḍito,
anya-e1102n5:30_54: Chaḍḍanīyataṁ jigucchanīyatañca āpajjati viññūnaṁ vuttampi cetaṁ nāradajātake.
anya-e1102n5:33_0: Akattipaṇḍitocāpi sakkena devānamindena vare diyyamāne evamāha
anya-e1102n5:34_0: “Bālaṁ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṁvase;
anya-e1102n5:35_0: Bālenā’llāpasallāpaṁ, na kare na ca rocaye.
anya-e1102n5:36_0: Kiṁnu te akaraṁ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṁ;
anya-e1102n5:39_0: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
anya-e1102n5:40_0: Vinayaṁ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassana”nti.
anya-e1102n5:45_1: Tattha dullabhañca manussattanti manussabhāvopi dullabhoyeva manussassa dullabhabhāvo kāṇakacchapopamādīhi
anya-e1102n5:45_2: veditabbo eko kira kassako gaṅgātīre tīṇi saṁvaccharāni kasitvā kiñcimattampi alabhitvā naṅgalaphālaṁ
anya-e1102n5:45_3: dvedhā bhinditvā gaṅgāyaṁ khipi tena gaṅgānadiyā vāhena eko uddhaṁ eko heṭṭhāti evaṁ dve naṅgalaphālakā
anya-e1102n5:45_4: gaṅgāyaṁ vuyhantā cirena eko uddhaṁ eko heṭṭhāti dve ekato hutvā pākatikā yujjanti tasmiṁ khaṇe vassasatavassasahassaccayena
anya-e1102n5:45_5: ekavāraṁ ummujjamāno kāṇakacchapo ummujjamānakkhaṇe tassa gīvā dvinnaṁ naṅgalaphālānamantare hoti ayaṁ
anya-e1102n5:45_6: kālo dullabhova evameva manussattabhāvopi dullabhoyeva tathāhi manussattabhāvaṁ alabhitvāva nirayapetaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsuyeva
anya-e1102n5:45_7: saṁsaritvā sīsampi ukkhipituṁ alabhantā ekabuddhantarā dve buddhantarā tayo buddhantarā cattāro buddhantarā
anya-e1102n5:45_9: tathā petaasurakāyatiracchānabhūmīsupi atikhuddakena attabhāvena tilabījasāsapabījassa catupañcachasattaaṭṭhakalabhāgamatteneva
anya-e1102n5:45_10: aṅguliyā patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānamatteyeva bhūmipadese nisinnānaṁ atikhuddakasattānaṁ gaṇanapathampi vītivattā
anya-e1102n5:45_11: te hi gaṇituṁ iddhimantapuggale ṭhapetvā añño ko nāma sakkhissati tehi mohandhabhāvena kaṇhasukkapakkhampi
anya-e1102n5:45_12: ajānantā anekesu buddhasatesu vā buddhasahassesu vā uppajjamānesupi buddhotisaddaṁ asutvā vītivattā,
anya-e1102n5:45_15: Buddhuppādakālepi sammādiṭṭhi hutvā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāva,
anya-e1102n5:45_17: tasmimpi sati aṅgavikalabhāvena saddhammasavanassāpi dullabhattāti evamādippabhedā manussattabhāvādikā khaṇasampattiyo dullabhāti veditabbā.
anya-e1102n5:45_18: Dullabhā khaṇasampattīti kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā khaṇasampatti dullabhāyeva tathā hi paccantavisaya arūpaasaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakāle
anya-e1102n5:45_19: vā majjhimadesepi cakkhādiaṅgavikalevā paripuṇṇaaṅgabhāvepi micchādiṭṭhibhūtā vā kusalūpapattisaṅkhātā
anya-e1102n5:45_20: khaṇā na honti paccantavisaye hi pavattā janā pāṇātipātādidasaakusalakammapatheyeva ramanti abhiramanti,
anya-e1102n5:45_23: Arūpinopi puggalā paratoghosavirahitattā sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhopi tesaṁ natthi,
anya-e1102n5:45_25: Asaññasattatiracchānapetanerayikakālesu pana pageva pūritapāramīnaṁ sattānaṁ pavattanampi abbohārikaṁ,
anya-e1102n5:45_27: sotavikalena dhammasavanatopi hāyati eḷamūgādibhāvena kusalasamādānā na honti.
anya-e1102n5:45_29: sabbajanānaṁ nayanarasāyatanabhūtaṁ sabbaññubuddhampi disvā pasādasommena cakkhunā oloketabbampi na maññanti
anya-e1102n5:45_30: manopadosavaseneva yugaggāhā hutvā yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu anekepi micchādiṭṭhino mahāniraye uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n5:51_0: Evaṁ satthuparinibbānato vassasataccayena patiṭṭhite isinā kāritattā’ isinagara’nti laddhanāme dvattapādibhūpālānaṁ
anya-e1102n5:51_1: nivāsaṭṭhānabhūte sīrikhettanagare erāvatiyā nadiyā pārimatīrabhūte pabbatasānumhi patiṭṭhitassa kañcanavaramahāthūpassa
anya-e1102n5:51_2: dāyakassa satvivamahādhammarañño kāle sāsanassa dvisahassasatādhikaekatiṁsatime vasse sāsane paṭiladdhasaddhānaṁ
anya-e1102n5:51_3: kulaputtānaṁ mahājānikaraṇavasena vimativinodaniyā vuttavacanaṁ saddayuttiatthayuttivasena sādhukaṁ avicinitvā
anya-e1102n5:51_4: nadiyā udakukkhepaṁ akatvā upasampadā kammassa kāritattā sāsane parājayamāpanne kulaputte upārambhakaraṇavasena
anya-e1102n5:52_0: Ettāvatā ca sirikhettanagaragocaragāmena satvivamahādhammarājagurubhūtena mahāveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakadharena’saddhammakovido’ti
anya-e1102n5:52_1: pākaṭa nāmadheyyena mahātherena upajjhāyo hutvā paññādhipatīnaṁ nivāsabhūte pacchimajinacakkasāsanavare
anya-e1102n5:52_3: rājagurunā tipiṭakanāgattherena ca ācariyo hutvā vejjakammajaṅghapesanakammādivasena anesanaṁ pahāya
anya-e1102n5:52_4: sammā ājīvena visuddhājīvehi saṅghagaṇehi kārakasaṅghā hutvā sirikhettanagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge dīghapabbatasānumhi
anya-e1102n5:52_5: erāvatiyā nadiyā tīre vālikapuḷine sīmāpekkhāya saha udakukkhepaṁ katvā pavattāya udakukkhepasīmāya dasadhā
anya-e1102n5:52_6: byañjanavipattiṁ akatvā ṭhānārahena ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadāya vīsativassena sāgarabuddhīti
anya-e1102n5:52_7: garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena bhikkhunā racito sāsanavipattihārako sīmavisodhanī nāma gantho samatto.
anya-e1102n5:60_0: Evaṁ pāṇinaṁ sabbe, sīghaṁ sijjhantu saṅkappā.
anya-e1102n5:62_0: Tāva tiṭṭhatu yaṁ gantho, sāsane hārayaṁ tamaṁ.
anya-e1102n5:63_0: Uddhaṁ yāva bhavaggā ca, adho yāva avīcito;
anya-e1102n5:66_0: Ciraṁ jīvatu no rājā, sāsanassa ujjotako.
